content: that's not true... or rather, that is true for protecting yourself against any germs stuck to the mask. But we're not talking surgery here, the point is to prevent aerosols from emitting from your mouth. You wear a mask to protect others, not yourself
good thing we don't need to agree on all these things to shoot evil spacerobots 😄

I for one are actually happy the corona struck. It proved very clearly how badly prepared we are, so it's a great wakeup-call that's serious enough to make changes, but not dangerous enough to wipe us out... Imagine if this was more like ebola or similar with covids infection-rate
yeah, that's why I said "with covids infection rate" 😉

Designed a hauler, got everything working, then realised the design sucked as it was total poison to get structural integrity on all the cargo crates with the way I set it up. Will restart on a new design tomorrow 😄
Btw, why are our ticker "VIR" and our name nomads? Viral Nomads? 😮
aaah
Ohms Lamb sounded more yummy
TrueTurn, that's such a retarded thing to say!
if it gets any chiller in here I'm getting a sweater!
man I need a holiday 😦
guess same for most of the world 😄
Spiritnor 😄
still havn't gotten any invitation ingame btw 😄
that's interesting... guess we need solar power for it to be really effective
are you out mining? it could be that your cargo is misaligned
is it worth buying new ships? I'm still using the noob ship, with a shitton of extra cargo and some extra thrusters
takes forever to fill up that ship with manual mining though :/
is each slot in the connected containers 1 crate?
then I guess I have 48 cargo attached...
exorium/aegisium and kutonium.... just travel further away from the stations
50k on that zone map... is that 50 km out? from what?
origin?
that will take some time, but it's doable I guess 😄
guess I should put some extra propellant tanks on and make sure to bring enough rods 😮
interesting... added 2 propellant and 2 thrusters, and my warp rating went from 1.34 or something and down to 0.04... can't move... wtf
now I guess I need to figure out how to remove those modules again....
I see those modules didn't attached properly...
not in line with the rest of the ship somehow
I'm using the easy build... no idea what you're talking about 😄
this ship has a durability error... no wonder 😄
when you easy-build it's a preset module though, you just line them up with the rest of the ship and it works
well, it did on the first thrusters I put on... now nothing seems to attach properly
well, until I can figure out some way to remove the modules I put on, I'm stuck
yeah figured it out eventually. something has really fucked up my ship though, so I'm down to three thrusters lol
i have a looong way to go to understand this game....

after checking some charts, it seems the ore scanner and ore collector at least need kutonium.... and from that picture it spawns 650km away from the edge of the fog... how the bejeeezus... max speed gotta go up on other ships I guess 😄
does any visuals change once you cross to another zone?
and more importantly, where is zone5? 😄
with my current setup I estimate I can go about 60-70 km into the roids before I need to turn back due to fuel... I need to spend some time working on rebuilding this thing
especially if I am to get 650km in 😮
but... I've seen mining lasers on the market. I assume they also need that mineral, so people must have been here?
or found a way to cheat already I guess 😄
that's still correct viribus
oh my... I left the safe zone... *drumroll*
mommy, I'm scared 😦
oh, good point 😄
are there npc pirates? or just evil players?
hm, there's lightning out here 😮
wohooo exorium
is there any way to dump ores from the ship? I just miiiight be in trouble with reaching back to base 😄
doh! lol thx
dropping some crappy ores then, really want to get back home with aegisium and exorium
if they both have the same name but only one is controlled there's really no other option than that one of the units aren't connected to the power network
well, either that or bug 😄 you could try to despawn and respawn the ship at a station, that sometimes clear things up
I have outlets and coolers on both my generators, but I've seen pictures of sets of 2 having just one set of those
ah ok, so it was buggy 🙂
problem is that the stations can't really do shit yet 😄
glorified cargo dumps 😛
